package ONLINEJAVA;

class This{
	int number1;
	
	public This(int n) {
	number1 =n;
	}	
	}

public class THIS {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

	// THIS TOPIC:---	
	System.out.println("THIS METHOD:-");
	This object = new This(100);
	System.out.println(object.number1);
	}

}
